knimeNode.name: Catch Errors (Var Ports)
knimeNode.shortDescription: End of Try-Catch construct. Use second input if execution leading to first input failed.

fullDescription.intro: This node forwards the input from the first port if the execution was successful. If execution on the top branch failed (and a matching try node was connected before the failing node!) then the input from the second port will be forwarded and the second variable outport will contain information about the observed error.

ports.inPort: The input to be used when execution on the main branch failed.
ports.outPort: Original input or default if execution failed.
